name: plug.dj - Transparent playlist and user menus
description: Supersedes Transparent playlist, store and lobby. This style makes the playlist, history and user settings transparent. For people who want to always see what's going on behind the menus. All menu items accessible from the user menu at the lower right are see-through, so as you buy avatars*, manage your profile or generally look at stuff, the video is seen behind the UI. *: Avatar and badge cells are not see-through, that is handled by Transparent dashboard and store
obsoletion_message: plug.dj is now a Rowl-owned asset, and has returned to business.
additional_info: Information Also see these other styles; Transparent UI Transparent buttons and menus Transparent dashboard and store Transparent dialog boxes Transparent miscellany Using Compact playlist menu? Instructions for using that with this style at the top of the code, to make Compact playlist menu function as intended with this in use. If you've grown fond of seeing the red border from Compact playlist menu, then see Playlist top-row border to get that back. make sure you apply after this style and modify it as instructed. Carrying on with the theme provided before in the other transparent interface styles, this style makes everything accessible from the user menu see-through. The one thing it doesn't do is communities, namely because I don't know how I am going to handle that quite yet. It might get done. You do not need the other styles to use this one; it can be used alone to permit seeing a video while you play with avatars, user settings and other personal aspects of your plug.dj account. 12/07/14.1 I made search suggestions function as they should in its entirety. Also added text shadow to friends search. 12/07/14.2 Added onto the code more to exclude the communities listing from being affected much, as I will create another style which will handle the dashboard and content cells. 12/07/14.3 Added information about using this with Compact playlist menu, which is basically the same code except for another box shadow specification is used. 12/11/14 Modified the box-shadow highlight for the first row / now playing row in the playlist manager. If you want the red border back, see Plylist top-row border. 12/12/14 Because of a scrollbar issue, z-index has been applied to it; This will bring the scrollbar the Z index, especially with the playlist top-row style in use. 12/15/14.1 Modified media header to have more transparent buttons, added transparent colour to playlist action buttons, REMOVED fixes for compact playlist menu (see 12/11/14) 12/15/14.2 Reverted some changes to the media header. After thinking about how difficult it would have been to implement, while I could have modified the header bar look correct in all circumstances, it was easier just to revert. 12/17/14 Added new code that pertained to this style, to accommodate for the recent plug.dj update. 12/25/14 Holiday update! Includes Radiant Community Script. 12/27/14 Forgot an ID for text shadow. 01/16/15 Added extra text shadow preferences for the experience bar, adding text shadow to the experience counter, which also changes colour in boost mode. 01/28/15 Added in the new "General settings" classes and IDs, because it no longer acts as a popup menu (which is what Transparent buttons and menus handled), but instead acts more like the user menus. It somehow feels more consistent this way. 04/10/15 Removed box shadow and image from user communities when there are no communities made, and changed plug notes button to the sub button. Good-bye plug notes, hello subscriptions!
